name: DOS-PLAN
description:
DOS-PLAN - A story about a professional agent whose goal is to sneak into the most protected corners of the map and go unnoticed. Your task is to go into the dense jungle, infiltrate the camp of frostbitten thugs and steal valuable data that they plan to put on the black market.

The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements where you play as a a professional agent whose goal is to sneak into the most protected corners of the map and go unnoticed. The zone is very well guarded and in order to reach the desired target, you will have to be very careful.

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Great soundtrack
- Various levels
